attributes.action: Stop council tax payments for everyone until covid-19 pandemic is over.
attributes.additional_details: A lot of people will struggle to pay their bills and will need to prioritise paying rent, gas and electric as well to have enough money for food.
attributes.background: To suspend all council tax bills until the covid-19 pandemic is over.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303274

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
